nodes.text: Just after the Battle of Yavin, the Alliance Fleet regrouped in the Pothor system in the Mid Rim. It was there that the Rebels were scheduled to meet with Commander Gial Ackbar and two prototype B-wing/E starfighters after the Battle of Roche. It was intended that upon Ackbar's arrival to the Pothor system, he was to be promoted to the rank of admiral.
